comment._content: The city is now known as Chalons-en-Champagne www.chalons-en-champagne.net/index.php/english

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Original of photo from Agence Meurisse at Gallica site (Meurisse number at lower left), publ. 1914, caption: Transport de blessés à Châlons-sur-Marne Transporting injured to Châlons-sur-Marne gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b90423306

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: jamica1:  Thank you for the current name of this location. artolog:  Thanks for finding the matching Gallica image. The Bain caption and the Agence Meurisse caption seem to agree, although the wording is different.  We will add more details when we update.
